duties_responsibilities.duty: Support hospital registration for outpatient and inpatient services by obtaining financial and statistical data.
Register and pre-register patients, collect patient responsibility, and obtain needed signatures.
Greet and route visitors/patients, respond to requests, and perform accurate demographic and insurance updates.
Verify, collect, and accurately enter insurance information into electronic health record system, and provide administrative support for Patient Access Dept.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or equivalent. Some college preferred.
